attributes.review: The moment the app finished downloading on my phone a helicopter crashed threw my bedroom and members of the CIA confiscated my phone. There names were Bongos and Kettlecorn. They thankfully gave me this new phone that is now “xenophobic free” as they stated. I thanked them for helping me out, but the app that caused this problem in the first place is absolutely horrible, and I hope Kettlecorn and Bongos can help out all of the rest of the poor poor Americans with this app on their phones.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app is completely horrendous it took me FIVE hours to download. After the download was completed it froze my phone and I was unable to use it for hours. When I was finally able to see the app I almost had a stroke from see the bright flashing lights saying, “Trump 2020”. I am now traumatized and do not think I will ever be able to download another app without having flashbacks from this app.
attributes.title: This App has Traumatized Me

attributes.review: "네 손님" 어서 오십시오 이 가게는 참 메뉴가 고르기도 쉽죠 뭘 시켜도 오감을 만족하지 하지 지나가던 나그네, 비둘기까지 까치까지 까마귀들까지 Cooking a sauce 입맛대로 털어 음미하고 lick it 말해 bon Taste so good 반응은 모두 쩔어 But 모두 자극적인 거 I want it till 다 먹일 때까지 연구하지 cross boundaries 경계 따위 없어 마치 창조하듯 소리를 만들지 그저 계속 만들어가 새롭게 Because we're one of a kind 누구도 따라 할 수 없는 our own game 시작부터 다 우리 꺼 잠깐 떠나간다 해도 결국 다시 찾게 될 열기가 식지 않는 메뉴 지금부터 싹 다 입맛에다 때려 박아 Du du du du du du 이게 우리 탕 탕 탕탕 Du du du du du du 이게 우리 탕 탕 탕탕 지금 바로 눈에 불을 켜 I just wanna taste it, make it hot 새로운 불판 위에 track을 달궈 메뉴 골라 call me up 원하는 걸로 다 serve Du du du du du du Cookin' like a chef, I'm a five star 미슐랭 "미"의 정점을 찍고 눈에 보여 illusion Whoo 첨 느꼈지 이런 감정 놀랄 거야 gonna shock 바로 감전 자물쇠 따 싹 다 (다) unlock (lock) Idea bank 머릿속을 털어 털어 비밀재료가 궁금하다면 (하다면) 사실 우린 그딴 거 안 써 그저 계속 만들어가 새롭게 Because…
attributes.title: 💕✨STREAM GOD’S MENU✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: when i downloaded this app the police came to my door and asked me if i wanted to go blow the protesters up...for legal reasons i wanna say i didn’t join but...after i did my duties i thought they would leave me alone but i could here trump through my phone saying “grab her by the 😾” i was so disturbed but my stupid conservative self said “oh to hear with out my ears👂🏽” so i went to go do my rituals around my trump shrine and he popped through the flag and told me to “leave if i didn’t like it here” i explained to him i loved the country but instead he threw a rat at me and started screaming i was threatening. him i ended up deleting the app but i still have ptsd when i hear old pot belly white men celebrating the 4th of july.
attributes.title: horrible😻

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app to try and support our Mr. president because, he’s racist just like me 🙌🏽white power of course🙌🏽 but the app turned out to be a huge disappointment, my phone caught on fire! (This is no joke), CNN and climate change are fake news 💯
I opened the app and it started crashing and then smoke out of no where! love my president but this app is horrible, President Cheeto please address these concerns, and also start leading the country
attributes.title: Absolutely not

attributes.review: This app brought many bugs to my area, which made a lot of the people in my area move 🤬 which brought our property rate down, so all these different thugs came to the neighborhood 😿 they terrorized everyone till we were the only family there 🥺 so they singled us out 😤 we tried our hardest to fight them off 😣 but they ate our dog 🐕 this is very unfair and made me very upset 😡 I do not recommend this terrible app😟
attributes.title: Terrible 😿

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded. After I downloaded it, Melania trump showed up at my apartment, broke through my front door, and throat kicked me. My landlord was very upset by all of this commotion and HE EVICTED ME. Then ivanka showed up and called the IRS and told them that I had committed tax fraud, which I did not. All of my personal belongings were confiscated by the government and I am now homeless. All because I wanted to download this app and support my president.
attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.review: this app is absolutely AWFUL. it takes forever to download, and used up so much storage on my phone. the music playing gave me a SEIZURE. this should not be #2 in news as the information provided is subjective and not reliable AT ALL. also, i had to sacrifice my soul to president orange to log in. i mean the government knows everything about me now, up to my favorite blizzard at dairy queen!!! i feel unsafe, there's no hiding from the government now.
attributes.title: SHOULD BE DELETED

attributes.review: Worst app ever in existence!!!all I wanted was to see what the orange 🍊 pedo was up too!! When I download the app it shut down my phone 👿😡when I turned it on it had a picture of the orange pedo in a remy costume I was so disturbed 😳 how could he disrespect remy like that!! Then things started to get even worse every my phone got overthrow by pictures of the orange pedo and I got yelled at for having such pictures on my phone😡the worst app ever don’t download
attributes.title: Worst app ever👁👄👁

attributes.review: This app is incredibly bad, you can’t do anything while the app is open and loading. It made my phone crash and I had to wait a whole day for it to turn on my phone again. I don’t recommend downloading this app. The music is terrible and made my ears bleed. I hope that I’m not the only one that sees that this app is bad. Not to mention the fact that this app made me have ptsd and severe pain to my ears and head. DON’T DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.title: Terrible app
